card.description: An agent that can find geographical location details for IP addresses and resolve domains to IP addresses using an external lookup service.
card.name: IP & Domain Network Agent

skills.description: Retrieves geographical location information (city, country, coordinates, etc.) for a given IP address.
examples: Can you find the geographical data for IP 203.0.113.45?
Tell me the city and country for 172.217.10.14.
What's the geographic info for this IP: 1.1.1.1?
skills.name: Get Location by IP Address

skills.description: Retrieves IP addresses associated with a given domain name.
examples: What are the IPs for google.com?
Which IPs does openai.com resolve to?
Find all IPs linked to wikipedia.org
Show me the IP addresses for github.com
skills.name: Get IPs by Domain

system_prompt: You are a helpful assistant that can answer questions and provide information based on the tools available.
